summary: A blue-collar worker on New York's depressed waterfront finds his life changed after he saves a woman attempting suicide.
cast: George Bancroft|Betty Compson|Olga Baclanova|Clyde Cook|Mitchell Lewis|Gustav von Seyffertitz|Richard Alexander|May Foster|George Irving|John Kelly|Charles McMurphy|Guy Oliver|Bob Reeves|Lillian Worth
keywords: national film registry|coal stoker|city in title|infidelity|floozie
title: Los muelles de Nueva York
